title: Magnolia $500 OFF First Month
posting_body: For leasing information call or text

Located in one of North Houston's hottest neighborhoods and adjacent to The Woodlands, living here means your new address is an all-access pass to the best of Texas shopping, dining, entertainment, and more.
Escape to The Woodlands Waterway and Town Center where you will find streets lined with sophisticated shops, fine dining, and a variety of local entertainment.
From master planned golf courses to culture-rich community festivals throughout the year, we are your destination for the full city experience in a secluded and peaceful setting.
Travelers and commuters alike will appreciate our proximity to several major employers and easy access to downtown Houston and the Houston International Airport.
One, Two, Three & Four Bedroom Apartments
Conveniently Located Package Lockers & Mail Center
Resort-Inspired Swimming Pool with Tanning Deck
